channel.title: lyrics translated on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in lyrics translated on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Margazhi Poove: Lyrics and Translations
item.description: I often feel like this woman – grown up but retaining a childlike spirit inside. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BLVuSL7Bpfg **Margazhi Poovae Margazhi Poovae Unmadi Maelae Oaridam Vaendum **

item.title: Vinnodum Mugilodum Lyrics and Translation
item.description: If anyone were to remake this song with rock instruments, I think it would hit the rock charts world wide even if no one understood it.

item.title: Malarnthum Malaraatha Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This song is a classic. It is from a movie called Paasa Malar (flower or affection). I grew up listening to lots of oldies and enjoyed their high lyricism.
